mapper.update: update ttmt_app_config set main_version_code = #{mainVersionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_version_code = #{subVersionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gray_version_code = #{grayVersionCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version_code = #{versionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_url = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_info = #{updateInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, main_version_code, sub_version_code, gray_version_code, version_code, resource_url, created_time, updated_time, update_info from ttmt_app_config where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, main_version_code, sub_version_code, gray_version_code, version_code, resource_url, created_time, updated_time, update_info from ttmt_app_config where version_code = #{versionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
